name: CSVelte
body: A PHP5.3+ library for working with CSV (tabular) data. While originally developed under the name of "PHP CSV Utilities" as a pseudo-port of Python's CSV module, it has evolved into a library all it's own. It has been designed from the ground up with the W3C "CSV on the Web" working group's, recommendations in mind.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
